name: Dragoneye
headline: More detailed object recognition than Google and Amazon
description:
Dragoneye helps devs build powerful apps and features that use images and videos. With our cutting-edge AI tech, folks can recognize things in the world with high accuracy and deep granularity - more than 13K classes - right out of the box. No more arduous process of annotating any training data or doing any machine learning work themselves.

Try out our demo today at https://dashboard.dragoneye.ai/!

founders.name: Alex Liao, Founder
founders.description:
Building computer vision so every app can see the world. 

ex-Jane Street, ex-Facebook, UPenn Physics and CS

generated_description:
**Dragoneye: Revolutionizing Object Recognition**

Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W24, Dragoneye is an innovative startup headquartered in New York. Their mission is audacious: to achieve more detailed object recognition than the giants of the technology world, namely Google and Amazon. 

At the heart of Dragoneye’s offering is powerful AI that enables developers to build applications capable of recognizing over 13,000 object classes straight out of the box. Forget the traditional routes of annotating training data or engaging in complex machine learning—Dragoneye makes it all straightforward. This isn't just for data scientists; it’s tailored for developers who want to imbue their apps with visual recognition capabilities without the headache of extensive coding or data preparation.

### Key Features:
- **No Code Required:** You can create custom models tailored to specific use cases in mere clicks. This lowers the barrier to entry for developers significantly.
- **Ready-to-Go Reporting:** From Python to JavaScript to REST APIs, integrating Dragoneye into your projects can be done rapidly, allowing you to see results almost instantly.
- **Versatile Use Cases:** Whether you're dealing with images of animals, fashion, food, or vehicles, Dragoneye can recognize it. The platform facilitates a variety of applications, making it an excellent choice for diverse industries.

### Take Action:
Curious about how it all works? You can try it out yourself by signing up for a demo to receive **2,000 free image predictions**. Just hop over to [Dragoneye’s dashboard](https://dashboard.dragoneye.ai/) to get started!

**Website:** [dragoneye.ai](https://dragoneye.ai/)

### The Core Team
Dragoneye currently operates with a compact team of just two employees, showcasing how a small, focused group can innovate in the tech space. Group Partner Diana Hu is overseeing the efforts, likely guiding the startup's remarkable trajectory.

In a world saturated with image recognition technologies, Dragoneye isn't just another player—it's a fresh contender aiming to carve out its niche with exceptional accuracy and ease of use. If you’re a developer dreaming of harnessing the power of vision AI, Dragoneye might just be your best bet.
